properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 6:34PM CST until February 28 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for most of the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark
* from Saturday February 15 until Thursday February 27.
* At 5 PM Sunday the stage was 35.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 43.0 feet on Friday February 21.
* Flood stage is 41.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday February 15 and
continue to rise to near 43.0 feet by Friday February 21.The river
will fall below flood stage by Thursday February 27.
* At 43.0 feet...In Mississippi, Lake Road in Nel-Win Camp is
flooding. Fields on Fox Island are flooding. In Arkansas, road from
the levee to the sport shooting camp west of Harrah's Casino is
covered.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
